channel.title: Redemption 718 Loading 738 | 24/7 | Webclient | Skilling/Pking | And more!
channel.description:
[center]
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/k4w95.png[/img]
==================================================
Foruns: [url=http://www.redemption.smffy.com]http://www.redemption.smffy.com[/url] Download: [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52915654/Redemption%20RSPS.jar]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52915654/Redemption%20RSPS.jar[/url]
==================================================
[b][u]Features:[/u][/b]
[u][b]Bosses:[/b][/u] - Queen Black Dragon PERFECTED - DOMINION TOWER WITH REWARDS - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - 100% Godwars - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Barrows!
[b][u]Pvp/PK/PVM/Combat:[/u][/b] - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better - 95% Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)
[b][u]Random Stuff:[/u][/b] - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 90% - DICING + FLOWER GAME - New 737 Cache with xteas and items!
[b][u]Armours/Bosses:[/u][/b] - All new 737 items! - Bosses and maps are upgraded to new looks - Armours are almost to date with bonuses and stats

item.description:
@Alex13 wrote:

who_knows68:

LOL NS3Server v4 just leeched… changing home doesn’t mean you coded sorry to say (:

First time poster eh? So am I.
Though I’m not as stupid as you seem to be.
Just because the pictures don’t show every little thing karma has done to this server (I am not saying he didn’t use ns3, Idk what source he used tbh) but that doesn’t mean all he has done was change home.

Anyways, ignore who knows68, This server is beastly.

  • Queen Black Dragon PERFECTED
